name: Knight Guard Adventure
description:
It's amazing adventure game with there are so many easy to hard levels. In this game your job is rescue the princess locked up in prison and is guarded carefully. Help Knight find the way to rescue Princess.

In this game also easy to control your character and also more power and weapons to help rescue princess. Solve one by one levels and earn coin and used that coin for power against enemy.

Features:
=======
- 24 Easy to hard levels.
- Beautiful graphics.
- So many different enemy.
- Supported IOS11.

So are you ready for play this game? Download Now..
